main: ^You walk over to an Incubus that you remember with a vague familiarity. When she turns around, you remember that she’s Morri, Cassian’s ex from a while back.
^“Ah, Sol, was it? I haven’t seen you in a long time.”
^“Haha, yeah it has been a while, Morri. I’m doing some investigation work for Cassian, you mind if I ask some questions?”

c-0: ^“Have you seen any suspicious activity at Cassian’s parties?”

^She shakes her head, “Not really, sorry. I don’t come to these that often, but in the times I have been here it’s pretty standard stuff, drunk college students, people hooking up in the bedrooms, that kind of stuff.”
^She laughs, and continues, “The most “suspicious” thing I saw was a certain someone mixing blood and candlewax and drinking it for a dare.”
^You chuckle, not suprised in the least. “Oh god he did not.”
^“He did! Cass doesn’t have a single sober brain cell sometimes.” She laughs and rolls her eyes.
^Morri sighs, “Ah…yeah. He’s still my friend and we’re on good terms, though. Sometimes you can’t read Cassian as well as you think you can, you know?”

^You nod, knowing that Cassian can be complicated to be around sometimes. Your thoughts were never clear around him. Everytime you’re around him, you’re not sure if the knot in your stomach is positive or negative…

c-1: ^“What’s going on in your life right now?”
^Morri smiles somberly, and answers slowly, “I’ve been doing a lot of searching about who I am, and what I want. I think, for a while I felt aimless and unsure.”

^“When I was with Cassian, I felt like there was something wrong with me. He was so gorgeous and stunning of course, but I just- didn’t feel anything for him, even though I tried so hard. After we broke up I realized that I just might not love men that way, you know?”

^There’s a silence that lies over the two of you as she stops talking, and you offer a small smile towards Morri. She smiles back, and laughs, “Yeah so, Cass was such a bad boyfriend he turned me lesbian.”
^That gets a chuckle out of you.

c-0: ^Morri looks at you and laughs “Are you asking me out right now?”
^“No, I’m not seeing anyone, yet…” she turns her head and looks over at a nearby Siren with dark wings, Morri’s gaze fixed on her. “But these parties do bring along amazing company, don’t you think?”

c-2: ^“Does Cassian have any clear enemies or people that would want to harm their reputation?”

^“Hmm, well I don’t think he’s done anything in particular to anger people, other than being his annoying self.” She pauses for a moment before responding. “Hmm, are you aware of the more… old fashioned monsters in the city?”
^Finally something concrete! “Yes. Do you think one of them would do this?”

^“Possibly…they’re not too prevalent today but they’ve never been fans of our kind.  And Cassian is probably one of the most influential people here, a symbol for our very lifestyle.” Morri stands back up, towering over you, and smiles. “Sorry, I know that’s vague but is that anything?”
^You sheepishly smile, and nod your head. “It’s plenty, thank you Morri.”
c-3: ^Morri gives you a curt wave. “Goodbye, nice seeing you again Sol.”
